item.title: AI for the Rest of Us: A Hands-On Workshop
item.description: ðŸš€ REGISTRATION for the May session has closed. New sessions will coming in July and August 2025. I’ll announce the dates soon. ðŸš€ ANNOUNCING TWO SESSIONS: “AI for the Rest of Us” - A Hands-On Workshop “AI for the Rest of Us” - It’s Not Just About Work Tasks I’ve been reflecting on what makes our upcoming AI workshop truly special, and I wanted to share more about the journey we’ll take together… This isn’t just another “productivity hack” class.
